orig_def: Something that you say when someone criticizes you to show that you do not think they are being fair because they are as bad as you
equiv_def: NA
equiv_dict: NA

orig_def: Deal with someone or something in a way that lacks due seriousness or respect or deviates from the truth.
equiv_def: Обманывать, вводить в заблуждение кого-л.
equiv_dict: Фразеологический словарь современного русского литературного языка / Под ред. проф. А.Н. Тихонова (т.1)

orig_def: To save someone : to help someone get out of a dangerous or difficult situation

orig_def: If someone or something is an unknown quantity, you do not know much about them or what effect they will have in the future
equiv_def: (разг.) - о человеке, чьи качества, возможности неясны, неизвестны.

orig_def: To make a mistake

orig_def: If someone or something is in the firing line, they are likely to be criticized, attacked, or got rid of

equiv_dict: Фразеологический словарь современного русского литературного языка / Под ред. проф. А.Н. Тихонова (т.1)

orig_def: To oppose the rules of the system: to do things that are not allowed
